subject: Clarification regarding the period of depreciation calculation in respect of retention of Laptop/i-Pad/Tablet/Similar Device or Mobile -reg.

No. 249705)} Sub: Clarification regarding the period of depreciation calculation in respect of retention of Laptopli-Pad/Tablet/Similar Device or Mobile In terms of Clause (c) of Policy Circular No.1.2.3.8/2024 dated 01st February, 2024, the Officer while leaving NHAI can retain Laptop/i-Pad /Tablet /Similar Device or Mobile on payment of  the depreciated value of the equipment or 5%   of the reimbursed Cost, whichever is higher. 2 It is clarified that depreciation value for retention of Laptop/i-Pad / Tablet/Similar Device or Mobile shall be calculated till the service particulars of the Officer including the period of repatriation leave, if any, etc., are verified by NHAI: 3_ This issues in consultation with the Finance Division in NHAI. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: 16ko#24 (CS.
